data.title: Propellers
data.text:
Why choose Brinkley for Propellers?

Why Choose Brinkley for Propeller Repair and Overhaul ? Brinkley Aerospace is a manufacturer (OEM) approved facility for Hartzell, McCauley, MT and Sensenich propellers.

Our factory trained team overhaul/repair in the region of 800 propellers per annum and hold spare parts stock in excess of $1.6 million.

This ensures we can offer every customer our high quality workmanship with fast turn around times at competitive prices.

Manufacture (OEM) accredited

Exchange blades available for MT-Propellers

Huge stock holding of new propellers and STC kits

Industry leading turn around times

Collection and delivery service with our own dedicated fleet of vehicles

In addition to General Aviation, we support many Vintage and Warbird operators worldwide with Hamilton Standard propeller repair and overhaul.

PROPELLER OVERHAUL

All propellers are overhauled by factory trained technicians with OEM parts, paints and consumables. We never use PMA unless specifically requested to by the customer.

Utilising OEM approved items ensure your propeller is operated as the manufacturer stipulates and will ensure flight safety but also aircraft serviceability and readiness.

PROPELLER SALES

Being OEM approved and also one of the Worldâs largest General Aviation propeller overhaul facilities, we have a huge stock holding of both parts and new propellers.

If we do not have it on the shelf, we can utilise our OEM connections to ensure we can supply it quickly and cost effectively. Donât hesitate to get in touch with your RFQ.

PROPELLER REPAIR

Our technicians travel the world supporting customers with their propeller repair requirements. If you are located in Scotland or Africa, we can be with you in quick time to support any AOG requirement.

Alternatively, we can receive your propeller into our workshop and support you from our 18,000 sq,ft facility in Bedfordshire, England.
